title: Hour 1: All That Jazz
description:
In this episode, Domonique Foxworth, Courtney Cronin, and Keyshawn Johnson try to answer Windy's viral question "What's going on in Utah?" as they debate the best trade scenarios and landing spots for Donovan Mitchell. Also discussed is Kevin Durant's trade request from the Brooklyn Nets and how much leverage he has (or doesn't have) to force a trade. Domonique, Courtney, and Keyshawn also debate the impact Tyreek Hill's departure will have on the Chiefs in the AFC. The crew reacts to some Twitter beef between the Lamar Jackson and Bernard Pollard.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Are the Knicks the best landing spot for Donovan Mitchell?
